anya-e0105n29:1_0: Ācariyo pana imaṁ visuddhimaggapakaraṇaṁ yathāvuttappakārena katvā aññāpi tipiṭakaṭṭhakathāyo anukkamena akāsi. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0105n29:1_1: Samantapāsādikaṁ nāma vinayaṭṭhakathaṁ buddhasirittherena ajjhesito mahāvihārassa dakkhiṇabhāge padhānagharapariveṇe mahānigamassāmino pāsāde vasanto akāsi.
anya-e0105n29:1_2: Sā panesā siripāloti nāmantarassa mahānāmarañño vīsatimavasse (973-bu-va) āraddhā ekavīsatimavasse (974-bu-va) niṭṭhānappattā ahosi.
anya-e0105n29:1_3: Tañca pana karonto mahāmahindattherenābhataṁ sīhaḷabhāsāya saṅkhataṁ mahāaṭṭhakathaṁ tassā sarīraṁ katvā mahāpaccarīkurundīsaṅkhepaandhakaṭṭhakathāhi ca gahetabbaṁ gahetvā sīhaḷadīpe yāva vasabharājakālā pākaṭānaṁ porāṇa vinayadharamahātherānaṁ vinicchayabhūtaṁ theravādampi pakkhipitvā akāsi.
anya-e0105n29:19_0: Rañño sirinivāsassasiriyā nivāsaṭṭhonabhūtassa siripālanāmakassa rañño (vimati, antimaviṭṭhe), siripālayasassino.
anya-e0105n29:23_1: yathā niṭṭhaṁ upāgatā’’ti pari. aṭṭha. nigamanakathā ca.
anya-e0105n29:24_0: Ayañca samantapāsādikā vinayaṭṭhakathā adhunā mudditachaṭṭhasaṅgītipotthakavasena sahassato upari aṭṭhapaṇṇāsādhikatisatamattapiṭṭhaparimāṇā (1358) hoti,
anya-e0105n29:24_1: tassā ca ekasaṁvaccharena niṭṭhāpitattaṁ upanidhāya catuvīsādhikasattasatamattapiṭṭhaparimāṇo (724) visuddhimaggopi antamaso chappañcamāsehi niṭṭhāpito bhaveyyāti sakkā ñātuṁ.
anya-e0105n29:24_2: Tasmā yaṁ buddhaghosuppattiyaṁ mahāvaṁsavacanaṁ nissāya ‘‘visuddhimaggo ācariyabuddhaghosena ekaratteneva tikkhattuṁ likhitvā niṭṭhāpito’’ti abhitthutivacanaṁ vuttaṁ,
anya-e0105n29:25_0: Nanu ca imissaṁ aṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘sumaṅgalavilāsiniya’’ntiādinā visesanāmavasena āgamaṭṭhakathānaṁ atideso dissati pārā. aṭṭha. 1.15,
anya-e0105n29:25_6: nigamane ca paṭhamaṁ sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyo sutvā karaṇappakāsanato ṭhapetvā visuddhimaggaṁ ayameva paṭhamaṁ katāti veditabbā.
anya-e0105n29:25_7: Visuddhimagge pana vinayaṭṭhakathāyanti vā vinayaṭṭhakathāsūti vā majjhimaṭṭhakathāsūti vā evaṁ sāmaññanāmavaseneva atideso dissati,
anya-e0105n29:25_10: Āgamaṭṭhakathānaṁ idhātideso pārā. aṭṭha. 1.15 imissāpi tatthāti dī. ni. aṭṭha.
anya-e0105n29:25_11: 1.8 evaṁ aññamaññātideso pana ācariyassa manasā suvavatthitavasena vā sakkā bhavituṁ,
anya-e0105n29:25_13: Ācariyena hi visuddhimaggaṁ sabbaso niṭṭhāpetvā samantapāsādikādiṁ ekekamaṭṭhakathaṁ karonteneva yattha yattha atthavaṇṇanā vitthārato aññaṭṭhakathāsu pakāsetabbā hoti,
anya-e0105n29:25_14: tattha tattha ‘‘imasmiṁ nāma ṭhāne kathessāmī’’ti manasā suvavatthitaṁ vavatthapetvā tañca atidisitvā yathāvavatthitaṭhānappattakāle taṁ vitthārato kathentena tā katā vā bhaveyyuṁ.
anya-e0105n29:25_15: Ekekissāya vā niṭṭhānāsannappattakāle taṁ ṭhapetvā aññañca aññañca tathā katvā sabbāpi apubbācarimaṁ pariniṭṭhāpitā bhaveyyunti evaṁ dvinnaṁ pakārānamaññataravasena ācariyassāṭṭhakathāsu aññamaññātideso hotīti veditabbanti.
